Exhibits are ...
If you want to show the court a doctor's note, police report, photograph, or other supporting document, you must refer to it in your affidavit as an "Exhibit". Each Exhibit gets a new letter. For example, Exhibit A, Exhibit B, etc., You will need to attach a copy of each document for the court.
